page.title: 10An Architect
page.content: On the 14th June we went to see an architect. She works in an office in her house. We asked what the letters after her name stood for and she said she was a Member of the Society of Architectural and Environmental Consultants. We looked at the sort of drawings she does and noticed that she put a lot of effort and detail into them. She designs houses and conversions of barns and other buildings into houses. Her hobbies were dress making, gardening and jewelry making and she plays the organ in the village church. She lives with her husband, a retired army officer, in a 19th century house with lovely views over the River Dart. She hopes to be able to go on with her work as there is a good demand for her skills.
